column5: This course isÂ ideal for those who aim to pursue a career in HRM. It is suitable for anyone whose work is business related. Participants can progress from a PgDip into an MSc, studying literature review, research design, qualitative and quantitative data collection, and analysis. Your dissertation will examine an HR issue in depth and a supervisor will assist you.
column7: Please see the university website for further information on fees for this course.
